============
nikola_check
============

-----------------------------------------------
Check if you have broken links or missing files
-----------------------------------------------

:Manual section: 1
:Manual group: nikola

SYNOPSIS
========

**nikola_check** [--check-links [--find-sources]] [--check-files]


DESCRIPTION
===========

Check if you have broken links or missing files.

SEE ALSO
========

nikola(1)
